item.title: 美国对 140 多万辆本田汽车发动机故障进行调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局正在对在美国销售的 140 多万辆本田汽车展开调查，因为人们担心本田汽车发动机连杆轴承故障可能导致发动机完全失效。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration is opening a probe into more than 1.4 million Honda vehicles sold in the United States over concerns that connecting rod bearing failures in their engines could lead to complete engine failure.】

item.title: 证券交易所敦促监管机构打击 "代币化股票
item.description: 一个代表全球最大证券交易所的组织正在敦促证券监管机构取缔所谓的代币化股票，认为基于区块链的代币给投资者带来了新的风险，并有可能破坏市场诚信。【原文：A group representing the world's biggest stock exchanges is urging securities regulators to clamp down on so-called tokenised stocks, arguing that the blockchain-based tokens create new risks for investors and risk damaging market integrity.】

item.title: 泰国 7 月出口超预期，但受关税影响增长放缓
item.description: 泰国商务部周一表示，泰国7月份的出口增长放缓，但好于预期，因为在美国加征关税之前出货量加速增长。【原文：Thailand's export growth slowed in July but beat forecasts as shipments accelerated ahead of U.S. tariffs, but growth is set to slow over the rest of the year after those tariffs took effect, the commerce ministry said on Monday.】

item.title: 印度将在通胀改革中直接利用亚马逊和 Flipkart 的数据，并推出服务指数
item.description: 印度统计部负责人表示，印度将开始直接从亚马逊和沃尔玛旗下的 Flipkart 等电商巨头处获取价格数据，以全面调整其基准通胀率指标，旨在捕捉不断变化的消费习惯，并消除人们对当前数据已经过时的担忧。【原文：India will start sourcing price data directly from e-commerce giants including Amazon and Walmart-owned Flipkart to overhaul its benchmark inflation gauge, aiming to capture shifting consumption habits and address concerns that current data is outdated, the head of the statistics ministry said.】

item.title: 杰富瑞将标准普尔 500 指数年度目标上调至 6600 点
item.description: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）在周日的一份报告中称，该公司将上证 500 指数的年底目标上调至 6,600 点，强调强劲的企业盈利是可能缓解对美国经济健康状况担忧的一个关键因素。【原文：Jefferies lifted its year-end target for the S&P 500 index to 6,600, highlighting robust corporate earnings as a key factor likely to ease concerns about the health of the U.S. economy, it said in a note on Sunday.】

item.title: 荷兰网上银行 Bunq 因洗钱控制不力被罚款
item.description: 荷兰中央银行 DNB 周一表示，荷兰在线银行 Bunq 因洗钱控制失误被罚款 260 万欧元（304 万美元）。【原文：Dutch online bank Bunq has received a fine of 2.6 million euros ($3.04 million) for failures in its money laundering controls, Dutch central bank DNB said on Monday.】

item.title: Keurig Dr Pepper 以超过 180 亿美元的价格收购荷兰咖啡公司 JDE Peet's
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper 周一表示，将以 157 亿欧元（183.8 亿美元）的价格收购荷兰咖啡公司 JDE Peet's。【原文：Keurig Dr Pepper on Monday said it will buy Dutch coffee company JDE Peet's for 15.7 billion euros ($18.38 billion).】

item.title: FACTBOX 相互竞争的电池技术塑造了电动汽车行业
item.description: 世界各地的初创企业都在竞相开发使用钠和硫等材料或其他创新化学物质的新型电池技术，旨在降低成本，减少电动汽车（EV）供应对某些关键矿物的依赖。【原文：Startups worldwide are racing to develop new battery technologies using materials like sodium and sulfur or other innovative chemistries, aiming to cut costs and reduce reliance on some critical minerals to supply electric vehicles (EVs).】

item.title: 聚焦：电池初创企业莱腾尚未说服汽车制造商重振 Northvolt
item.description: 硅谷初创公司Lyten需要说服汽车制造商相信它能在瑞典破产的电动汽车电池制造商Northvolt失败的地方取得成功--创造一个欧洲冠军，以减少该地区对中国的依赖。【原文：Silicon Valley startup Lyten will need to convince carmakers it can succeed where bankrupt Swedish EV battery maker Northvolt failed - creating a European champion to reduce the region's reliance on China.】

item.title: 特朗普政府阻止美国风电项目，Orsted 现金计划面临风险
item.description: 风电场开发商 Orsted 筹集急需资金的计划面临风险，因为美国下令停止建设一个即将完工的项目，分析师称，该丹麦集团的股价周一可能会承压。【原文：Wind farm developer Orsted's plan to raise much-needed capital is at risk following a U.S. order to halt construction of a near-complete project, and the Danish group's share price could come under pressure on Monday, analysts said.】

item.title: 早间竞价：为什么 "对反弹和降息至关重要
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行、法国巴黎银行关注美联储 9 月降息
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）和法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas）周五分别发表报告称，美国联邦储备委员会主席鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在杰克逊霍尔（Jackson Hole）发表讲话，释放出转向宽松政策的信号后，这两家券商预计美国联邦储备委员会将在9月份降息。【原文：Barclays and BNP Paribas expect the U.S. Federal Reserve to cut interest rates in September, after Chair Jerome Powell signaled a shift toward an easing bias in a speech at Jackson Hole, the brokerages said in separate notes on Friday.】

item.title: 全球央行行长担心陷入美联储风暴
item.description: 周末聚集在美国山区度假胜地的全球央行行长们开始担心，围绕美联储的政治风暴可能也会吞噬他们。【原文：Global central bankers gathered at a U.S. mountain resort over the weekend are starting to fear that the political storm surrounding the Federal Reserve may engulf them too.】

item.title: 华侨银行启动 10 亿美元数字美国商业票据计划
item.description: 新加坡第二大银行华侨银行（Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp）周一表示，该行已制定了一项价值 10 亿美元的数字美国商业票据计划，以增强其美元融资能力。【原文：Singapore's second-largest bank Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp said on Monday it has established a $1 billion digital U.S. commercial paper programme, bolstering its dollar funding capabilities.】

item.title: 乌克兰袭击俄罗斯能源基地后油价攀升
item.description: 乌克兰加强了对俄罗斯的攻击，加剧了人们对俄罗斯石油供应可能中断的担忧，而美国降息的预期则提振了全球经济增长和燃料需求的前景。【原文：Oil prices edged higher on Monday after Ukraine stepped up attacks on Russia, fanning concerns Russian oil supply could be disrupted, while expectations of a cut in U.S. interest rates buoyed the outlook for global growth and fuel demand.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州工厂让中国铜业公司在关税战中占得先机
item.description: 中国铜扁线制造商 Wellascent 去年初决定在得克萨斯州建厂，是为了规避地缘政治风险。现在，随着美国征收进口关税促进了对其本地生产产品的需求，这项投资正在得到回报。【原文：Chinese copper flat wire manufacturer Wellascent's decision early last year to build a factory in Texas was a hedge against geopolitical risks. Now the investment is paying off as U.S. import tariffs boost demand for its locally produced goods.】

item.title: 瑞穗和 MUFG 加入日本银行争夺海外基金经理交易的行列
item.description: 他们告诉路透社，日本瑞穗银行和 MUFG 正在瞄准收购海外基金管理公司或与之合作，与其他日本金融公司一道，争取在全球投资市场上占有更大份额。【原文：Japanese banks Mizuho and MUFG are targeting buying or partnering with overseas money managers, they told Reuters, joining other Japanese financial companies aiming for a larger share of the global investing market.】

item.title: 美元从鲍威尔的鸽派言论中艰难复苏
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的鸽派态度导致美元兑欧元下跌超过1%之后，美元周一试图从四周低点回升。【原文：The U.S. dollar attempted on Monday to pull itself up from a four-week low on the euro after a dovish pivot from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell sent it tumbling more than 1%.】

item.title: 市场寄望美国降息，亚洲股市反弹
item.description: 亚洲股市周一大涨，因为投资者对美国可能恢复降息感到高兴，同时希望人工智能超级明星英伟达（Nvidia）本周的业绩将有助于证明该行业的高估值是合理的。【原文：Asian share markets rallied on Monday as investors celebrated the likely resumption of interest rate cuts in the United States, while hoping AI-superstar Nvidia's results this week will help justify the sector's stratospheric valuations.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Keurig Dr Pepper 接近以 180 亿美元收购 JDE Peet's
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日援引知情人士的话报道，Keurig Dr Pepper 即将以大约 180 亿美元的价格收购欧洲咖啡公司 JDE Peet's。【原文：Keurig Dr Pepper is close to a roughly $18 billion deal for European coffee company JDE Peet's , the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）着眼于在火箭第十次飞行测试中实现 "星际飞船 "可重复使用性里程碑
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索公司（SpaceX）将于本周日从得克萨斯州第十次发射其大型星际飞船（Starship）火箭，以实现因过去的测试以早期失败告终而错过的几个长期追求的发展里程碑。【原文：Elon Musk's SpaceX is set to launch its massive Starship rocket for a tenth time from Texas on Sunday to achieve several long-sought development milestones missed due to past tests ending in early failures.】

item.title: 中国称 "猖獗 "的美国保护主义威胁农业关系
item.description: 北京驻华盛顿大使说，美国的保护主义正在破坏与中国的农业合作，并警告说农民不应承担世界上两个最大经济体之间贸易战的代价。【原文：U.S. protectionism is undermining agricultural cooperation with China, Beijing's ambassador to Washington said, warning that farmers should not bear the price of the trade war between the world's two largest economies.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，Spotify 在推出新服务的同时标榜价格上涨
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周日援引这家音乐流媒体服务提供商的联席总裁兼首席商务官亚历克斯-诺斯特罗姆（Alex Norstrom）的话报道称，Spotify 将提高价格，因为它将投资于新功能，并以 10 亿用户为目标。【原文：Spotify will raise prices as it invests in new features and targets 1 billion users, the Financial Times reported on Sunday citing the music streaming provider's Co-President and Chief Business Officer Alex Norstrom.】

item.title: 马斯克称 xAI 将 Grok 2.5 开放源代码
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司xAI已将其Grok 2.5模型开源，并计划在大约六个月后将其Grok 3模型也开源。【原文：Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI has open-sourced its Grok 2.5 model and plans to do the same for its Grok 3 model in roughly six months, the billionaire said in a post on his social media platform X on Saturday.】

item.title: 特朗普新任设计主管旨在改进数千个美国政府网站
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的新任设计主管周六表示，他的目标是改善政府服务，使其像苹果应用商店一样令人满意。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's new design chief said on Saturday he aims to improve government services to be as satisfying to use as the Apple App Store.】

item.title: 日本央行上田预计就业市场收紧将推动工资上涨
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，由于就业市场收紧，工资上涨正在向大型企业以外的地区蔓延，并可能继续加速，这表明他对再次加息的条件正在逐步具备持乐观态度。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said wage hikes are spreading beyond large firms and likely to keep accelerating due to a tightening job market, signaling his optimism that conditions for another interest rate hike were falling into place.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德：外籍员工推动了欧元区经济发展
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）周六表示，近年来，外籍工人的涌入推动了欧元区经济的发展，有助于抵消工作时间缩短和实际工资降低的影响。【原文：An influx of foreign workers has given the euro zone's economy a boost in recent years, helping offset shorter working hours and lower real wages, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said on Saturday.】

item.title: H&M 在巴西开设首家门店，雄心勃勃地要在当地生产
item.description: 瑞典快速时尚零售商 H&M 周六在巴西开设了第一家实体店，并在巴西开展了在线业务，该公司的一位高管表示，该公司已在巴西当地生产一些商品，包括鞋类和沙滩装。【原文：Swedish fast-fashion retailer H&M opened its first physical store in Brazil on Saturday and launched online operations in the country, where it is already producing some items locally, including footwear and beachwear, an executive said.】

item.title: 特朗普拯救了英特尔吗？并没有
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将向英特尔注资近 90 亿美元，以换取其 9.9% 的股权。但分析师们表示，这笔钱--这家陷入困境的芯片制造商根据一项联邦资助法案，无论如何都会得到这笔钱--并不足以让其合同芯片制造业务蓬勃发展。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is injecting nearly $9 billion into Intel in exchange for a 9.9% equity stake. But the money - which the struggling chipmaker was slated to receive anyway under a federal funding act - will not be enough for its contract-chipmaking business to flourish, analysts said.】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，可口可乐与银行家合作探讨出售 Costa Coffee 事宜
item.description: 据天空新闻（Sky News）周六报道，美国软饮料公司可口可乐正与拉扎德（Lazard）的银行家合作，准备出售咖啡连锁店 Costa。【原文：U.S. soft drinks company Coca-Cola is working with bankers at Lazard for a sale of coffee chain Costa, Sky News reported on Saturday.】
